sqlMap.update:
UPDATE YE161020 SET TNM = #tnm# , BSNO_ENC_CNTN = #bsnoEncCntn# , HSHR_CL_CD = #hshrClCd# , RSPL_NTN_INFR_NM = #rsplNtnInfrNm# , RSPL_NTN_INFR_CD = #rsplNtnInfrCd# , DTY_STRT_DT = #dtyStrtDt# , DTY_END_DT = #dtyEndDt# , RE_STRT_DT = #reStrtDt# , RE_END_DT = #reEndDt# , RSDT_CL_CD = #rsdtClCd# , RSPL_NTN_NM = #rsplNtnNm# , RSPL_NTN_CD = #rsplNtnCd# , INCTX_WHTX_TXAMT_METN_CD = ( SELECT BA0300.MANGE_ITEM15 FROM BASS0300 BA0300 WHERE BA0300.DPOB_CD = DPOB_CD AND BA0300.COMM_CD = #inctxWhtxTxamtMetnCd# ) , INPM_YN = #inpmYn# , C152_STD_TX_DDC_YN = #c152StdTxDdcYn# , ISMT = #ismt# , REVN_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR = #revnAddr#
WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

UPDATE YE161020 SET PRIF_CHNG_YN = #prifChngYn# , ISMT = #ismt# , REVN_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR = #revnAddr#
WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR , AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD , AA.SYSTEMKEY , AA.FNM , AA.RESNO_ENC_CNTN , AA.NNF_CL_CD , AA.TNM , AA.BSNO_ENC_CNTN , AA.HSHR_CL_CD , AA.RSPL_NTN_INFR_CD , AA.RSPL_NTN_INFR_NM , ( SELECT BA0300.MANGE_ITEM20 FROM BASS0300 BA0300 WHERE BA0300.DPOB_CD = AA.DPOB_CD AND BA0300.COMM_CD = AA.RSPL_NTN_INFR_CD AND BA0300.RPSTTV_CD = 'A001' ) AS RSPL_NTN_INFR_ITEM , AA.DTY_STRT_DT , AA.DTY_END_DT , AA.RE_STRT_DT , AA.RE_END_DT , AA.RSDT_CL_CD , AA.RSPL_NTN_CD , AA.RSPL_NTN_NM , ( SELECT BA0300.MANGE_ITEM20 FROM BASS0300 BA0300 WHERE BA0300.DPOB_CD = AA.DPOB_CD AND BA0300.COMM_CD = AA.RSPL_NTN_CD AND BA0300.RPSTTV_CD = 'A001' ) AS RSPL_NTN_ITEM , ( SELECT BA0300.COMM_CD FROM BASS0300 BA0300 WHERE BA0300.DPOB_CD = AA.DPOB_CD AND BA0300.MANGE_ITEM15 = AA.INCTX_WHTX_TXAMT_METN_CD ) AS INCTX_WHTX_TXAMT_METN_CD , AA.INPM_YN , AA.PRIF_CHNG_YN , AA.C152_STD_TX_DDC_YN , AA.CHILD , AA.BSC_DDCN_FP_CNT , AA.SCC_NFP_CNT , AA.CHBT_ADOP_NFP_CNT , AA.WMN_NFP_CNT , AA.SNPRNT_NFP_CNT , AA.DSBR_NFP_CNT , AA.AGE6LT_NFP_CNT , AA.FILE_SBT_YN , AA.FILE_APP_YN , AA.FORM_CD , AA.ISS_DT_SEIL_NUM , AA.KYBDR , AA.INPT_DT , AA.INPT_ADDR , AA.ISMT , AA.REVN_DT , AA.REVN_ADDR , BB.PRCSP_INCM_TX_SUM , BB.PRCSP_RGON_INCM_TX_SUM , BB.PRCSP_PAY_SUM , CC.YETA_0C22 , CC.YETA_0C29 , CC.YETA_0C63 , CC.YETA_0C64 , CC.YETA_0C65 , CC.YETA_C162 , CC.YETA_C112 , CC.YETA_C113 , CC.YETA_C120 , CC.YETA_C163 , DD.CHILD AS ADDR_MRCT FROM YE161020 AA , ( SELECT EE.DPOB_CD, EE.YRTX_BLGG_YR, EE.CLUT_SEPT_CD, EE.SYSTEMKEY, SUM (EE.PRCSP_INCM_TX_SUM) AS PRCSP_INCM_TX_SUM, SUM (EE.PRCSP_RGON_INCM_TX_SUM) AS PRCSP_RGON_INCM_TX_SUM, SUM (EE.PRCSP_PAY_SUM) AS PRCSP_PAY_SUM FROM YE160404 EE WHERE EE.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND EE.YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND EE.CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND EE.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# GROUP BY EE.SYSTEMKEY, EE.DPOB_CD, EE.YRTX_BLGG_YR, EE.CLUT_SEPT_CD)BB, YE169010 CC, YE161020 DD WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#
AND AA.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD(+) AND AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR = BB.YRTX_BLGG_YR(+) AND AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD = BB.CLUT_SEPT_CD(+) AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY(+)
AND AA.DPOB_CD = CC.DPOB_CD AND AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR = CC.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD = CC.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = CC.SYSTEMKEY
AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = DD.SYSTEMKEY
SELECT COUNT(SYSTEMKEY) totcnt FROM YE161030 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE161020 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE161020 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , FNM , RESNO_ENC_CNTN , TNM , BSNO_ENC_CNTN , HSHR_CL_CD , RSPL_NTN_INFR_NM , RSPL_NTN_INFR_CD , DTY_STRT_DT , DTY_END_DT , RE_STRT_DT , RE_END_DT , RSDT_CL_CD , RSPL_NTN_NM , RSPL_NTN_CD , INCTX_WHTX_TXAMT_METN_CD , INPM_YN , PRIF_CHNG_YN , BSC_DDCN_FP_CNT , SCC_NFP_CNT , CHBT_ADOP_NFP_CNT , WMN_NFP_CNT , SNPRNT_NFP_CNT , DSBR_NFP_CNT , AGE6LT_NFP_CNT , FILE_SBT_YN , FILE_APP_YN , FORM_CD , ISS_DT_SEIL_NUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey# , #fnm# , #resnoEncCntn# , #tnm# , #bsnoEncCntn# , #hshrClCd# , #rsplNtnInfrNm# , #rsplNtnInfrCd# , #dtyStrtDt# , #dtyEndDt# , #reStrtDt# , #reEndDt# , #rsdtClCd# , #rsplNtnNm# , #rsplNtnCd# , #inctxWhtxTxamtMetnCd# , #inpmYn# , #prifChngYn# , #bscDdcnFpCnt# , #sccNfpCnt# , #chbtAdopNfpCnt# , #wmnNfpCnt# , #snprntNfpCnt# , #dsbrNfpCnt# , #age6ltNfpCnt# , #fileSbtYn# , #fileAppYn# , #formCd# , #issDtSeilNum# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YE161020 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , FNM=#fnm# , RESNO_ENC_CNTN=#resnoEncCntn# , TNM=#tnm# , BSNO_ENC_CNTN=#bsnoEncCntn# , HSHR_CL_CD=#hshrClCd# , RSPL_NTN_INFR_NM=#rsplNtnInfrNm# , RSPL_NTN_INFR_CD=#rsplNtnInfrCd# , DTY_STRT_DT=#dtyStrtDt# , DTY_END_DT=#dtyEndDt# , RE_STRT_DT=#reStrtDt# , RE_END_DT=#reEndDt# , RSDT_CL_CD=#rsdtClCd# , RSPL_NTN_NM=#rsplNtnNm# , RSPL_NTN_CD=#rsplNtnCd# , INCTX_WHTX_TXAMT_METN_CD=#inctxWhtxTxamtMetnCd# , INPM_YN=#inpmYn# , PRIF_CHNG_YN=#prifChngYn# , BSC_DDCN_FP_CNT=#bscDdcnFpCnt# , SCC_NFP_CNT=#sccNfpCnt# , CHBT_ADOP_NFP_CNT=#chbtAdopNfpCnt# , WMN_NFP_CNT=#wmnNfpCnt# , SNPRNT_NFP_CNT=#snprntNfpCnt# , DSBR_NFP_CNT=#dsbrNfpCnt# , AGE6LT_NFP_CNT=#age6ltNfpCnt# , FILE_SBT_YN=#fileSbtYn# , FILE_APP_YN=#fileAppYn# , FORM_CD=#formCd# , ISS_DT_SEIL_NUM=#issDtSeilNum# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , FNM , RESNO_ENC_CNTN , TNM , BSNO_ENC_CNTN , HSHR_CL_CD , RSPL_NTN_INFR_NM , RSPL_NTN_INFR_CD , DTY_STRT_DT , DTY_END_DT , RE_STRT_DT , RE_END_DT , RSDT_CL_CD , RSPL_NTN_NM , RSPL_NTN_CD , INCTX_WHTX_TXAMT_METN_CD , INPM_YN , PRIF_CHNG_YN , BSC_DDCN_FP_CNT , SCC_NFP_CNT , CHBT_ADOP_NFP_CNT , WMN_NFP_CNT , SNPRNT_NFP_CNT , DSBR_NFP_CNT , AGE6LT_NFP_CNT , FILE_SBT_YN , FILE_APP_YN , FORM_CD , ISS_DT_SEIL_NUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE161020 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , FNM , RESNO_ENC_CNTN , TNM , BSNO_ENC_CNTN , HSHR_CL_CD , RSPL_NTN_INFR_NM , RSPL_NTN_INFR_CD , DTY_STRT_DT , DTY_END_DT , RE_STRT_DT , RE_END_DT , RSDT_CL_CD , RSPL_NTN_NM , RSPL_NTN_CD , INCTX_WHTX_TXAMT_METN_CD , INPM_YN , PRIF_CHNG_YN , BSC_DDCN_FP_CNT , SCC_NFP_CNT , CHBT_ADOP_NFP_CNT , WMN_NFP_CNT , SNPRNT_NFP_CNT , DSBR_NFP_CNT , AGE6LT_NFP_CNT , FILE_SBT_YN , FILE_APP_YN , FORM_CD , ISS_DT_SEIL_NUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE161020 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE161020 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
SELECT C152_STD_TX_DDC_YN FROM YE161020 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#
